skill.name: agent.behaviors.skills.primitives.EnsureVictimsEvacuation
skill.description:
To ensure the evacuation of wounded humans contained in a set of a given "VictimsUnits". Each wounded humans are evacuated by the issued 'medicalUnit'.
When several "VictimsUnit" should be evacuated, the agent acts on each unit by following the order of the elements into the 'victimsUnits' list.
Wounded human victims won't be evacuated if: - 'victimsUnit' is not reached (it has moved away or it is localized in a non accessible urban block) - 'victimsUnit' does not have wounded humans.

parameter.name: medicalUnit
parameter.description: The medical unit which is ordered to take into account wounded elements of each "victimsUnit".

link.name: reach
link.description: To enact the decision to "reach" a resource node.

link.name: ensureEvacuation
link.description: To enact the decision to make victims evacuated through the "medicalUnit".

feedback.name: evacuated
feedback.description: Sent each time a set of victims within each "victimsUnit"have been evacuated.

feedback.name: notEvacuated
feedback.description: Sent each time a set of victims within each "victimsUnit" cannot be evacuated.

feedback.name: done
feedback.description: Sent when all "victimsUnits" have been visited.

feedback.name: failed
feedback.description: Sent if the set of "victimsUnits" is empty (no "victimsUnits" to act on).
